title: Custom Tank Platform With Ladder
item_description:
Custom Tank Platform With Ladder

  • Width: 79”
  • Length: 80”
  • Height: 180”

Loading Note: Rigging and loading assistance will be provided by a licensed professional rigging company contracted by West Auctions. Rigging company will load this item using a crane. Rigging company will only load this item on a flat trailer or flatbed. No box trucks, car trailers, etc will be loaded. Loading assistance does not include additional crating, palletizing, packaging, or securing, etc.

Removal Note: This item is available for removal by appointment only from July 21, 2025 through July 25, 2025. Please contact West Auctions to schedule your appointment.
